serviceDescription: Query real-time UI state from the Agent Hub web interface

getUIState.description: Get current UI state including route, open documents, and context for a session

getActiveWorkspaceDocument.description: Get the content of the currently open workspace document

getCurrentPageContext.description: Get current page context including route, UI state, and available actions

getUIStateStats.description: Get statistics about tracked UI sessions (active users, sessions, etc.)
